column7: Individual research, special problems, thesis, development and/or design work under the direction of the Honors advisor. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 12 hours. Credit is not given for more than 12 hours of special problems, research, thesis and/or individual studies may be counted toward degree. Prerequisite: This course is restricted to students who have junior or senior standing, admission to the ACES Honors Program, and consent of instructor.
